content: Dennis and Akiko Tito are the first two crew members on Starship's second commercial spaceflight around the Moon -> spacex.com/updates
We might need a different name, as this is basically just Starlink with roaming capability, so you can take your terminal anywhere

originalTweet.content: Starlink for RVs now has over 100,000 customers! Access high-speed, low-latency internet on an as-needed basis anywhere Starlink provides active coverage -> starlink.com/rv
